House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04128
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING AND ESTABLISHING THE PHILIPPINE HIGH SCHOOL FOR SPORTS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TAN, ALYSSA SHEENA P.
DATE FILED : 2019-08-22
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Reyes (000 2019-09-05)2. Sy-Alvarado (000 2019-09-10)
3. Barba (000 2019-09-12)4. Dy (F.M.C.) (000 2019-11-14)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for Meeting/Hearing on 2019-09-24
          -The Committees on Basic Education & Culture and Youth & Sports Development will draft a substitute bill consolidating House Bills Numbered 303, 545, 4013, 4128, 4492, 2545, 2867, 2875, 3277, 4344, 4084, 4248 and 4249
          -Joint Meeting of the Committee on Basic Education and Culture and Youth and Sports Development.
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-09-30
          -Joint meeting of the Committees on Basic Education and Culture and Committee on Youth and Sports Development, 10:00 a.m., Speaker Nograles Hall, SWA. Consideration and approval of the substitute bill on National Academy of Sports / Philippine High School for Sports
      3. Committee Report filed on 2020-02-17
          -House Committee Report No. 00232, Substituted by HB No. 06312 (In substitution of House Bill Numbered 00303, 00545, 02545, 02867, 02875, 03277, 04013, 04249, 04344, 04492 and 05480)
      4. Approved for Inclusion in the Calendar of Business on 2020-02-18
      5. Other Action by the Committee on Rules on 2020-02-19
          -Approved on Second Reading 2020-02-19
      6. Other Action by the Committee on Rules on 2020-03-03
          -Date Transmitted To the Senate: 2020-03-04 Date Received by the Senate: 2020-03-04 Date Requested to Form Conference Committee: 2020-03-03 Date Agreed to Form Conference Committee: 2020-03-04 Senate Bill Counterpart: SB01086 Date House Agreed on Concom Report: 2020-05-19 Date Senate Agreed on Concom Report: 2020-05-11
          -Approved on Third Reading 2020-03-03
      7. Other Action by the Committee on Rules on 2020-05-19
          -House ratified CC report on 2020-05-19, Senate on 2020-05-11
MOTHER BILL: HB06312
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
